extendedInfo.description: The Guild Wars 2 Dragon Timer allows you to quickly and easily check The Shatterer, Tequatl the Sunless, and the Claw of Jormag to see when they will be up. Gone are the days of alt+tab-ing out of Guild Wars 2 just so you can check when a dragon will be up! At work? No problem! Just whip out your phone and see which dragon you can slay tonight when you get home!FEATURES:* All US and European Servers* Status of all three dragons: The Shatterer, Tequatl the Sunless, and the Claw of Jormag* Note: If you use a high-resolution tablet, the app may look slightly distorted. I'm working on an HD version to fix this issue.* More? Leave a comment for your ideas!Special thanks to:Guild Wars Temple (http://guildwarstemple.com) for letting us access their database :)!-----------------Copyright Â© 2011 ArenaNet, Inc. All rights reserved. Guild Wars 2, ArenaNet, NCsoft, the Interlocking NC Logo, and all associated logos and designs are trademarks or registered trademarks of NCsoft Corporation. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

reviews.title: Good concept but...
reviews.comment: ... firstly: it is missing all the minor event timers from the Web site, surely it is as easy to add them to an additional page. Secondly and most important it drains battery like a game on steroids! Why do 3 timers need the max 1.4GHz of the GS3 all the time (single thread as well). Please fix and will update rating.
reviews.author: Billy Rigas

reviews.title: Very reliable
reviews.comment: I love how this timer gives you both a countdown before the window and a countdown of how much time is left in the window. It has never been off for me. Overall, It\'s a great timer for any dragon slayer.
reviews.author: Michael Abramson

reviews.title: Somewhat Half-Baked
reviews.comment: As a newer player, I consult the website timers frequently for lower level events. While I appreciate what this app _does_ do, it should be rather trivial to add the rest of the event timers. If this were a program for personal use, I could understand, but as it is I don\'t really see any excuse for the very limited scope of this app. I\'m keeping it installed in the hope that I get an update notification at some point for a version with improved functionality. The foundation is solid; just build on it!
reviews.author: Alex Soriano

reviews.title: Decent app
reviews.comment: The accuracy of this app is great, as long as no one messes with the source.  Just needs to be updated to use less system resources and needs more timers.
reviews.author: Ahmed Mirza

reviews.title: Useful and accurate
reviews.comment: Useful and accurate. A widget is needed so we don\'t have to open the app everytime.  Additionally, a way to enter times will also be good instead of visiting the source website to update the timer.
reviews.author: JC John Sese Cuneta

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Absolutely spot on. Should make more... for all group events, etc.
reviews.author: Leanne Dewey

reviews.title: Accurate?
reviews.comment: Great app. Yesterday everything was accurate but now the timers are a bit off
reviews.author: Marga Bolte

reviews.title: Decent app
reviews.comment: UI could do with improvements. The timers take a long time to load after selecting a world. When your screen turns off and you turn back on the timer is either inaccurate and needs refreshing or just shows as 0:0:0. App is good otherwise, helped me kill some dragons yesterday.
reviews.author: Andrew Fox

reviews.title: Nice but im suspicious
reviews.comment: Why is app so big? And why do you need phone calls permission??? You are not targeting 1.6. (Explain or fix to get 5/5)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: This is a wonderful app, and I\'m excited for when the meta events timer is added. The fact that all the servers are added makes it that much better, however the only think I wish for would be a way to set notifications for the dragons so it\'ll go off when they reach window. Other than these things, the structure of the app is simple and wonderful. Keep up the good work, and I look forward to more improvements and updates in the future!
reviews.author: Craline Rashnila

reviews.title: Good but could be great
reviews.comment: Maybe add the rich oricaculm vein tracker to the app would make it much better.
reviews.author: Taylor St.Arneault

reviews.title: Feature Request
reviews.comment: Love this app but why not add all major events like the beginning of CoF...or the event to kill the cave troll to get into the reactor area....plz add more event notifications. I would even pay for a complete list....maybe another app you pay for with full features and timers.
reviews.author: Mark Slavens

reviews.title: Greay!
reviews.comment: I love it! But you really need to add more bosses or at least behemoth, thanks  :)
reviews.author: Bella Bombon

reviews.title: Decent but...
reviews.comment: I wish this app had a widget that way I could designate a home screen for it and not have to constantly open the application.
reviews.author: Hovanes Mestdzhyan

reviews.title: Very good,  but needs an update.
reviews.comment: Other Dragon timers found on the Web now have more events aside from the dragons (such as Maw and SB). So this app would be Perfect if....   1.We can get notifications for when an event is going to start and  2. We get more events that spawn chests.
reviews.author: Nick Engracio

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Never miss another dragon spawn. No more noob chat \"Has it spawned\". A keeper!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very handy, but could be perfected..
reviews.comment: I think it would be great if there was a way to set up a notification when the event is reported as started and/or when a window is open.
reviews.author: Chad Van Etten

reviews.title: Great but missing one thing
reviews.comment: While this is a very good app it still missing alarm function for the timer.  That would make this so much better.
reviews.author: Ryan San

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It needs Widgets :D
reviews.author: Adam Benting

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love it just add diferent colors during spawn time or waiting time :) and an alarm and ill be all set
reviews.author: A Google User
